text.en: Usage data including how you interact with our website, features you use, and time spent on the site.

text.en: Essential cookies: Required for the website to function properly.

text.en: Information about your Spotify playlists, including playlist names, tracks, and creation dates.

text.en: Spotify Safe ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your information when you use our website and services. By using Spotify Safe, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

_ww-text_text.en: Spotify Safe ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your information when you use our website and services. By using Spotify Safe, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

text.en: We collect several types of information from and about users of our website, including:

_ww-text_text.en: We collect several types of information from and about users of our website, including:

text.en: Device information including IP address, browser type, operating system, and device identifiers.

_ww-text_text.en: Device information including IP address, browser type, operating system, and device identifiers.

text.en: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and store certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data that may include an anonymous unique identifier. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our service.

_ww-text_text.en: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and store certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data that may include an anonymous unique identifier. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our service.

text.en: Personal information such as name, email address, and profile picture when you connect your Spotify account.

_ww-text_text.en: Personal information such as name, email address, and profile picture when you connect your Spotify account.

text.en: Authentication cookies: Remember your login status and preferences.

text.en: Analytics cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

text.en: We may share your information in the following situations:

_ww-text_text.en: We may share your information in the following situations:

_ww-text_text.en: With service providers who help us operate, improve, and secure our website.

text.en: To comply with legal obligations, enforce our terms, and protect our rights or the rights of others.

_ww-text_text.en: To comply with legal obligations, enforce our terms, and protect our rights or the rights of others.

text.en: With your consent or at your direction, such as when you choose to share your playlists.

_ww-text_text.en: With your consent or at your direction, such as when you choose to share your playlists.

text.en: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information:

_ww-text_text.en: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information:

text.en: The right to access the personal information we have about you.

_ww-text_text.en: The right to access the personal information we have about you.

text.en: The right to request correction or deletion of your personal information.

_ww-text_text.en: The right to request correction or deletion of your personal information.

text.en: The right to object to or restrict certain processing of your data.

_ww-text_text.en: The right to object to or restrict certain processing of your data.

text.en: The right to data portability, allowing you to obtain a copy of your data.
